message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to $100. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $110?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm confident in the value of the product at $130, I could be persuaded to meet you halfway at $120. This feels like a fair compromise.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my request. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $115 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
